paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on TTR variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: In the reported heterozygous individuals, protects the carriers from disease.

functional_data.summary: T119M TTR was stably expressed and formed heterooligomers with amyloidogenic TTR variants.

variants.segregation_data: Does not segregate with disease in families as it protects carriers.
variants.additional_notes: T119M variant stabilizes heterotetramers and may have therapeutic potential.
key_quotes: T119M TTR was stably expressed in transduced HepG2 cells and was secreted as an oligomer.
The results obtained in the present study demonstrate the stabilization of heterotetramers by T119M TTR in human cells.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
